messages.title: STANDING FOR CHANGE
messages.content: If you're disillusioned with our current crop of career politicians why not vote for a local man who wants to bring common sense back into politics.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to be a great local MP, working for local people. I am standing for change.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Clive Balchin highlights his intention to engage with the community through social media and a regularly updated website as primary means of communication, distinguishing his approach from the main parties which he suggests rely on money and party machines.
